features: NATURALLY PURE: Experience the cleanest and greenest unscented wipes. Crafted from 100% naturally absorbent pulp and enriched with non-GMO, synthetic-free ingredients for optimal purity.
HYPOALLERGENIC: Dermatologically tested with a gentle formula and skin-nurturing ingredients to minimize irritation and allergic reactions.
ALOE VERA: Soft wipes with 99% natural ingredients like Aloe Vera, Chamomile, and Pomegranate to gently moisturize your baby's sensitive skin.
SAFE & NON-TOXIC: Our baby wipes are made from a durable plant-based cloth and are free from dyes, fragrances, optical brighteners, alcohol, chlorine, parabens, PET, and other detrimental chemicals.

MOTHER NATURE APPROVED: Dedicated to sustainability, our packaging is made from 40% recycled materials. Our wipes use 100% biodegradable and compostable cotton, free of optical brighteners and totally chlorine free.
body.description: Happy Little Camper natural baby wipes with aloe vera are non-toxic, fragrance free, alcohol free and chemical free to protect your newborn baby and toddlers sensitive skin. Our unscented hypoallergenic cotton baby wipes are free from harmful chemicals and dyes and pure, gentle and safe for babies, toddlers and children. Natural cotton ultra-soft and thick baby wipes for an easy, one-wipe clean. All Happy Little Camper wipes are free from animal origin ingredients.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Happy Little Camper Baby Wipes Pure, clean and ultra-soft baby wipes are perfect for on the go. Gentle for baby's sensitive skin. Happy Little Camper natural baby wipes with organic aloe vera are non-toxic, fragrance free, alcohol free and chemical free to protect your newborn baby and toddlers sensitive skin. Our unscented hypoallergenic baby wipes are free from harmful chemicals and dyes and pure, gentle and safe for babies, toddlers and children. Natural ultra-soft and thick baby wipes for an easy, one-wipe clean. HYPOALLERGENIC - dermatologically tested, gentle conditioning formula designed to reduce the risk of irritation or allergic reaction.ALOE VERA - protects your baby’s sensitive skin with ultra-soft wipes.NON-TOXIC - our products are free from dyes, fragrances, non-woven synthetics, alcohol, chlorine, parabens, PEGs and other harmful chemicals. Flushable Wipes WE LOVE NATURAL - Made from naturally absorbent 100% pulp, and our CLEAN SOLUTION we select the purest ingredients for our products.TOTALLY FLUSHABLE - Our Flushable wipes are INDA & EDANA compliant and feature rapid disintegration whilst maintaining excellent strength when wet. SEWER and SEPTIC SYSTEM SAFE. Natural Cotton Wipes WE LOVE NATURAL - Made from naturally absorbent GMO-free cotton, and our CLEAN SOLUTION we select the purest ingredients for our products.MOTHER NATURE APPROVED - we are committed to sustainable manufacturing practices, and packaging made from 40% recycled materials. We use 100% natural cotton, free of optical brighteners and totally chlorine free. All Happy Little Camper wipes are free from animal origin ingredients.

· Ideal for sensitive skin: Happy Little Camper water wipes are gentle enough for premature, newborn and infant skin · 100% All natural, plant based ingredients, with no nasties! · Super soft and Non-irritating · No chlorine, phthalates, parabens · Alcohol and Fragrance Free · Handy Flip-Top Lid Happy Little Camper Baby Wipes contain pure, natural, organic extracts to gently cleanse, soothe and care for your baby’s skin at change time. Happy Little Camper Water Wipes are not only perfect for baby, they can also be used as make up removers and are very handy to have in your home, car and hand bag too.

About Happy Little Camper This means that not only is your baby comfortable in Happy Little Camper, but also safe and free from harsh chemicals. Knowing the facts, consider making a better choice for your baby’s bottom by making Happy Little Camper your go-to natural baby care brand. We're committed to sustainably - sourced ingredients, safe manufacturing processes and packaging made from recycled materials.

Plant - Based, Natural Baby Care Products Made from 100% natural cotton, our products contain pure and healthy ingredients. Products You Can Count On Our 100% natural cotton wipes are fragrance-free and paraben-free. Natural Baby Care at Affordable Prices We never use any of the nasty chemicals conventional brands use, because we wouldn't sell products we wouldn't be confident to use on our own happy little campers.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best wipes ever
reviews.reviewText: The best wipes I’ve ever used so healthy and better than other brands

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewText: My newborn has reacted really well to these wipes! They are clean and effective and love that these are extremely wet (like some other brands are) it’s perfect amount of moisture to clean the newborn mess!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 4, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Used to find them in my local grocery store and I don’t know why they stopped carrying them. Gentle and very cottony soft texture. Nice and thick and they don’t rip. We use them for adult to baby clean ups.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Expensive than the other stores.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not the softest
reviews.reviewText: Overall I think they are ok. These wipes aren't very soft but they do seem to be gentle on my babies skin to where it's not irritating

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It is so hard to find something without all the chemicals which I will not buy. Very happy with these wipes for our little fur baby. Give them a try……no scent and they do the trick.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These wipes are pretty nice and I have no complaints

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great and clean ingredients
reviews.reviewText: I love this clean wipes, they are big enough and does the work without all that toxic chemicals other brands use

These are great to keep around the house snd in the car. There are plenty per package and great for sensitive skin. The price is a bit high and often it’s hard to get one out without pulling several but otherwise it’s a good product.
Not impressed at all. When i opened the pack the wipes had a chemical plastic smell. Probably from the package. And all wipes were so compressed together and i found them hard to separate.

I really like the nappies but not these wipes. They aren’t gentle enough for a newborn. Slightly scratchy texture compared to other wipes and made my baby’s bottom red. I’m keeping them for when he’s older and skin not so sensitive and will stick with wAter wipes for now.
I found these very gentle and did not irritate my sons skin even though he’s prone to eczema.
Great multipurpose flushable wipes. Very happy with it.
